comment: Professor Eckford is awesome. His lectures are straight to the point and he uses easy to understand terminology. He's always in a good mood, and always there for help. He is also very encouraging. His classes are easy, but you do need to participate and do whatever work he gives you to do.

He has a few pet peeves to be aware of if you are going to take future classes: 1. Do not just refer to him as "Eckford." You can call him "Al" or "Professor" but never just "Eckford." 2. Do not skip class, and pay attention. Tests are based on what is taught in class. 3. Tests are easy and graded based on key words that you use.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--LECTURE HEAVY

comment: SUPER easy class! Just show and you will pass. There is a mini-quiz at the end of every class and that how he takes attendance.
rating_tags: Skip class? You won't pass.--Hilarious--Amazing lectures
